content.rendered:
Snorkeling

Discover The Under Water World

Discover the underwater world and visit colorful reefs – no experience required! Let our professional staff guide you through the tropical coral and marine life right on our doorstep. All of our trips include a professional guide with a fish identification card and your snorkeling equipment (if you would like we can also include a life jacket or snorkel vest). There are two trips to choose from – a 1½ hour trip to one reef ($30), or a 3 hour trip which visits two reefs and has snacks and refreshments included ($45). Both trips include your snorkel equipment and briefing and guiding by a PADI professional. On board our boat we always have fresh cold drinking water, as well as a first aid kit. We visit the shallower reefs of Sosua, where there is a variety of friendly fish and stunning coral. If you are interesting in free diving (diving down under the water) have your guide explain the basics and give you a demonstration! Of particular interest in Sosua is the coral nursery on our 3 Rocks site. Here you will see endangered staghorn coral being grown in the water. It is then replanted onto the reef once it has reached a certain size. The trips depart in the afternoon; meeting time is 12.30. When you arrive at the shop we will fit you for mask and fins, give you a briefing on the site, and head out to the boat. We can also arrange transport from your hotel if required, just give us a call!

Snorkeling Locations

3 Rocks

Three Rocks are three sections of coral reef that span 45m / 150ft, hosting an incredible mix of tropical fish and plant life. Look out for the coral nursery off the third rock, where endangered staghorn coral is cultivated and replanted onto the reef when it reaches a good size.

canyon

jetpack-related-posts.title: Paradise Island
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you’re looking for something special, look no further. This all day trip includes 3 meals, private transportation to Paradise Island (known locally as Cayo Arena), and guided snorkeling around one of the Dominican Republic’s most beautiful reefs. The day starts early at 7.30, where we meet and begin our journey to…
